Class JerseyServer

java.lang.Object
  org.odata4j.jersey.producer.server.JerseyServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ODataServer
public class JerseyServer
extends Object
implements ODataServer

OData server using the Jersey JAX-RS and Sun's HTTP server implementation.
